Header.Title: Generation of Diverse Complex Analytical Tasks - Formal Definition
Header.ProjectName: Generation of Diverse Complex Analytical Tasks

Objective.Description: Generate a single, detailed, and technically complete Formal Definition (FD), which will be used by the 'Code Generator' agent to create a SINT prompt that in turn should generate 4 different complex analytical tasks, each requiring a unique interdisciplinary approach with detailed expert analysis, numerical ratings, iterative convergence, and comprehensive synthesis.

Context.Description: The generated tasks should cover fundamentally different areas of knowledge, require various sets of experts and methodologies, demonstrate the broad spectrum of SINT framework capabilities, and require highly detailed analysis with numerical ratings and iterative synthesis.

TaskSpecification.Description: The 4 generated tasks must strictly demonstrate the following SINT modes:

Task1.Requirements: With detailed expert positions, numerical ratings (1-10), cross-criticism, and iterative convergence

Task2.Requirements: With structured rating system, detailed arguments, and multi-round synthesis

Task3.Requirements: With comprehensive feedback loops and detailed analysis

Task4.Requirements: With numerical ratings, cross-evaluation, and iterative synthesis

Constraints.Item: Each of the 4 tasks must require a separate full SINT application
All tasks must be fundamentally different in thematic and approaches
All tasks must be formulated considering the principle of contextual grounding (PCG)
Each task must have clearly defined objectives and expected outcomes
All expert positions must include detailed arguments, numerical ratings (1-10), cross-evaluation scores, and specific examples
The output must include multiple rounds of criticism, iterative convergence, and comprehensive synthesis

LanguageConstraint.Requirement: All output (including 4 generated tasks) MUST BE in English

AnalysisRequirements.Item: Each expert must provide detailed, specific arguments with concrete examples, data points, and numerical ratings
The process must include iterative rounds of criticism and synthesis with detailed cross-evaluation between experts

OutputFormat.Description: A prompt that will generate 4 complex analytical tasks as specified
